column1: During the next 24 hours, as of 1200 hours on 26 September 2019, showers or thundershowers will occur at
several places in the sea areas extending from Trincomalee to Hambantota via Batticaloa.
Winds will be south-westerly to southerly in the sea areas extending from Potuvil to Kankasanturai via Galle,
Colombo and Mannar. Winds will be easterly to south-easterly in the other sea areas. Wind speed will be (25-
35) kmph in the sea areas around the island.
The sea area extending from Mannar to Kankasanturai can be fairly rough at times as the wind speed can in-
crease up to (40-45) kmph at times.
